Sunhawk decides to make a suggestion and goes to attention before 
talking.

Sunhawk:  I read the full report about the Beast Wars and after we've 
located the Predicons I'd suggest coping a tactic they once used.  We 
steal the energon shelding device they'll inevitably have to use and 
force them to stay in Beast Mode constantly.  Then while they sleep 
the Beast Modes will take over leaving them helpless and at our 
mercy.  We can then use parts from there ship to repair our own and 
get the Pit out of here.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...> wrote:
> Siref arrived in the CR room and took his BIG elephant form and 
> switched for robot mode "Yeah I like that." he said joyfully.

and

> > > He sees the the external sensore were brough back. He connects 
> some

who

the 
> > same technology."He checks the sensors."Damn! The ship looks like

> Quintessa, 
> > or into Unicron."
> > > He laughed at the joke only he, and maybe history buffs, would 
> get.
> > > 
> > > {Talos}
> > > Deck 2, CR Chamber room
> > > 
> > > Talos had moved through the damaged ship and ascended the 
stairs 
> to 
> > deck two where the main generators and CR chambers were located. 
> > After recieving Sunhawks and Hot Rod's reports he nodded before 
> > moving to a communications hub that wasn't sparking and turned on 
> > ship wide broadcasting, "Sensors have detected massive energon 
> > readings outside the ship, all personnel should report to the CR 
> > Chamber bay for alterate form protection, do not stray far from 
the 
> > ship before you have done this."
> > > 
> > > Closing the channel he moved to a console and began typing, on 
> the 
> > top of the ship a hatch slid open freeing an extending pole that 
> > began scanning the surrounding area for compatible forms. After 
> > several seconds the machine stayed at a low hum holding a list of 
> > available alternate forms.
> > > 
> > > Entering one of the CR chambers he let the nanobots change his 
> > casing to more suit the transformation to beast mode. When the 
pod 
> > opened again Talos stepped out in his mammoth form. "Talos, 
> > MAXIMIZE!" He spoke as his body adjusted back to it's robotic 
form. 
> > Opening the comm to the bridge again he spoke, "Might want to 
> repair 
> > that destroyed viewing portal there guys, the damage has probably 
> > rendered the bridges protective fields offline or at least 
unstable 
> > though from the time frame I'm guessing unstable so be careful 
> don't 
> > want you guys slipping into stasis lock..."
